overview: Find out what it's really, really, like to be a Spice Girl!  The girls talk about how they write their songs, and what it's like being famous and having Number Ones..! Hear all about the spicey fun and laughs they had when they shared a house together! Who did the washing up? Who was the messiest Spice? Who shared a bedroom? Who did the most housework (and who never did any!) And what's the best thing about being a Spice Girl? Watch and find out!
title: Spice Girls: Girls Talk!
